name: SaskCycle
description: A Kijiji style recycling and reuse app, including a route planner to pick up and drop off items. Built for CMPT370 in an agile team of 5

name: Due Date Bot
description: A due date tracking bot built for a study group discord server. Tracks assignments and due dates, and sends timed alerts before due dates.

name: Road Coffee
description: The Shopify based website for Road Coffee. Worked on styling, SEO, Performance Optimization, and a custom video loader for the blog.

name: Car Game
description: A simple frogger style game built as practice for a game jam
